item.description:
The Urban League of Southern Connecticut Young Professionals
New Haven & Stamford Chapter
Presents:
Election Watch Night Networking Event
With financial presentation:
“Investing in a Volatile Market”
Presented by: Floyd Gantt, Financial Advisor
With Edward Jones Investments
Tuesday, November 4, 2008
Location:
Foster's Restaurant
56 Orange St.
New Haven, CT
6pm - 11pm
Donation: $5 or a gently used winter item, such as
coats, hats, gloves and scarves
Food will be provided along with a cash bar.
Come out and support your favorite candidate!
Please RSVP by e-mailing: ypnewhaven@ulswc.org or call 203-641-4852
item.name: Election Watch Night Networking Event
